content: Does anyone know how to influence the data that is available to the ig publisher in the temp/_data folder? I'd like to include some information from the ImplementationGuide in the generated pages (for example, who authored the IG), but I don't see any data that is exposed to Jekyll to be able to pull that information from
I believe if you have an _data in pages, it'll get copied across. If you want to change what's in one of the existing data files, you'll need to change the IG code

"ig": {
"id": "test-ig",
"name": "Test Implementation Guide",
"url": "http://hl7.org/fhir/test-ig",
"status": "draft",
"experimental": true,
"publisher": "FHIR Project"
}
